modifiers.name: Analytical
modifiers.description: Asking the right questions is half the battle.

modifiers.name: Reflective
modifiers.description: Looking back so that you can move forward.

modifiers.name: Curious
modifiers.description: Curiosity is the spark behind the spark of every great idea.

modifiers.name: Flexible
modifiers.description: Be stubborn about your goals and flexible about your methods.

modifiers.name: Interpersonal
modifiers.description: If everyone is thinking alike then no-one is thinking.

modifiers.name: Persistent
modifiers.description: Impossible only means you haven't found the answer yet.

modifiers.name: Adventurous
modifiers.description: Some call it adventure, you call it a way of life.

modifiers.name: Confident
modifiers.description: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.

modifiers.name: Independent
modifiers.description: You are in control of the outcome.
